column4: hi, i've just installed ubuntu edgy after having gentoo on for a while, and i'm looking to install some IDEs like kdevelop, anjuta, eclipse. but i can't find them in the apt cache... any tips?
hello, how can i install some IDEs on ubuntu edgy?
there is tons in the repos eclipse is just one
well `apt-cache search eclipse' doesn't bring up much, searching on kdevelop gives less
